item.title: LustEngine Part 1: Project Intro
item.description: I’m writing a game engine. This isn’t usually a good idea if you want to make games, and finish them. But I’ve got a bunch of experience working on games and games middleware, and I enjoy working on that part of the stack - so this is a process I find intrinsicly valuable. If your goal is to make a game Don’t Do What Donny Don’t Does. What is LustEngine Lust is Love2D in Rust (filtered through my own preferences and biases).
